pullRequest.title: "[E] to enable building" hint while building is paused
pullRequest.bodyText:
Currently, when "auto-pause building" is off, no UI hint is shown when players press E to toggle pause/resume building, until they try to build something. Thus, they are left to guess what the current state of building is if they have pressed E multiple times. If they guess wrong, this can cause them to accidentally start building something when they only wanted to create a plan.
This PR makes it so that an "[E] to enable building" hint is a persistent indicator of the state of building (always displayed when building is paused) when auto-pause is off, regardless if building plans exist. It does not change how the hint is displayed when auto-pause is on.

commit.message: Show building hints while building is paused
